definition[0]: used to tell someone that you feel the same way as they do, that you are in a similar situation etc
definition[1]: a me-too product is one that a company begins to sell after it has seen that other companies are successful with the same type of product – used to show disapproval
definition[2]: a me-too product is introduced by a company after it has seen that other companies are successful with the same type of product
example[1]: The bill would cancel funding for companies which produce me-too copies of existing drugs rather than discovering totally new ones.
